articles.author: Rob Price
articles.title: Get hot, do drugs, build a bunker: Meet Silicon Valley's AI super preppers - Business Insider
articles.description: Some tech workers preparing for an AI apocalypse — or utopia — by leaning into working out, building bunkers, or burning their retirement savings.
articles.content: Henry, a boyish-looking AI researcher, believes there's about a 50/50 chance that in the next few years AI will become so powerful and sophisticated it will pose an existential threat to all human li… [+16764 chars]

articles.title: Cancelling mRNA studies is the highest irresponsibility - Nature
articles.description: The rest of the world is not following the US government’s dangerous path, and will stick with the technology that helped the world out of the COVID-19 pandemic.
